      • submit

        public void submit(java.lang.Object text,
                   java.lang.Object comment,
                   java.lang.Object participantID,
                   java.lang.String activeUser,
                   int noteState)
            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Adds a note to the database that has been submitted by a note writer
        Parameters:
        text - main text from a note
        comment - comment added by note writer
        participantID - ID of the participant who is the subject of the written note
        activeUser - current user logged into the program
        noteState - state added to note once submitted. 1 means the note has been submitted and is ready for review. 0 means the note is a draft
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • acceptNote

        public void acceptNote(java.lang.Object selectedNote,
                       java.lang.Object content,
                       int isAccepted)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Updates a row in the Note table of the database to indicate that the specified note has been reviewed and accepted.
        Parameters:
        selectedNote - Selected Note from a JList in the GUI
        content - Content of the Note to be updated in the database
        isAccepted - a 1 or 0 value indicating if the note has been accepted. 0 means a rejected note. 1 means accepted
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • populateNotesPendingReview

        public static java.util.List<NoteLogic> populateNotesPendingReview()
                                                            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        retrieves list of notes that are pending review to be displayed in the GUI
        Returns:
        List of NoteLogic objects
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        public static NoteLogic select(int noteID)
                        throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                               java.sql.SQLException
        retrieves a single note specified by the noteID parameter
        Parameters:
        noteID - Unique ID for the desired note from the database
